channel.title: Atiloc | From scratch | Extreme content | Perfect combat | 24+ Skills | Active
channel.description:
[center][img]http://atiloc.com/adv/adlogo.png[/img] [url=http://www.atiloc.com/][img]http://i.imgur.com/3z9C4De.png[/img][/url][url=http://atiloc.com/forum/][img]http://i.imgur.com/oVbCCRg.png[/img][/url][url=http://atiloc.com/start/][img]http://i.imgur.com/lNTi95Z.png[/img][/url][url=http://atiloc.com/vote/][img]http://i.imgur.com/P9Bmdyx.png[/img][/url][url=http://atiloc.com/store/][img]http://i.imgur.com/K466oaX.png[/img][/url][/center]
[size=18pt][u][b]Great Playerbase:[/b][/u][/size] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NdbkLJ0.jpg[/img]
[ul][FONT=Comic Sans MS][SIZE=4][COLOR="#DAA520"] [*]Server written from scratch. [*]Perfect server stability. [*]All skills(click skill tab icons for options) [*]Many perfected minigames. [*]Interactive content. [*]Several bosses with amazing combat effects. [*]Many toggles to customize your gaming experience [*]Perfected entity combat. [*]Enabled audio to enhance your game-play. [*]Tons of other content, join now![/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/ul]
